section.name: Review mode

div.p: The document named 'hahaha' in review mode. The document has the meaningless body 'sdfsdf' and the author Marc is about to request deleting this document.

section.p: Review mode means that a document is presented to you so that you can read it, but not write in it. Review mode prevents you from accidentally changing the document.

In review mode, you can also do some particular actions with respect to the document that would not be useful or appropriate when you are in the middle of changing the document. At the top, next to the Edit button, you see buttons for several action menus. These action menus are:

ol.li: Publication actions: request publication, request take offline, schedule publication or take offline.

ul.li: If you are doing the tour, use the back button of your browser to continue. (There is no hyperlink here, because you can get here from many different pages.)
